comment: Dr Bullock is humorous and knowledgeable. Best of all, she pushes one to go into the discomfort zone of learning. I have grown as a person and a future educator. Would highly recommend.

Very opinionated and strong minded. Can be very intimidating and sarcastic in the beginning! Good teacher, Funny and will work with you to ensure you understand but can be somewhat be controlling, nit-picky, and  with grading, and over all difficult to work with.

Dr. Bullock is a great professor! She is a little intimidating at first and very sarcastic but once you figure out that that's her personality, she's hilarious. I learned so much in her class and I would absolutely take her again!
If there's no other class that's available, you can take her. She is sure not the best. Not clear on instructions.
Loved her! She is very strict but learned so much from her. She is super sarcastic and very down to earth.
I would take her again in a heart beat. Great teacher. Speaks the truth and is not biest at all !

I had Dr. Bullock during maymester. She was tough but very helpful and informative. She helped us LEARN the material instead of memorize it. I would not suggest taking a math course during maymester if you can help it, but I would suggest taking Dr. Bullock. :-)

Dr. Bullock is a terrific teacher! Loved, loved, love her class.  I learned so much about myself as a future teacher.  She's teaching tolerance and acceptance, things all students should learn to do.  The discussions about race might offend some, but it's not personal, it's historical. We have to understand it if we're going to change it.

I took a cultural diversity class which is req'd for my ECE major. I did not enjoy the anti-white liberal biases of Patti. I also did not enjoy her teaching that "alternate lifestyles" (such as hers) were moral or acceptable to teach to children.
GREAT teacher! Great person as well.
The best professor I have had at KSU!  Take her class if you get a chance!!
Be professor I have ever had!
